channel.title: Pirtex
channel.description:
[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img910/4522/R6xzDS.jpg[/img] Server Goals - Host the server, have a good and active community, continue to have great updates! Things Done; god wars all skills working 100% add loads of good customs game logo NPC facing donator area donator only items 100% member system bank tabs quests member only quests bank tabs training zone admin zone staff zone added random events In Progress Of Doing; all dupes fixed
To Be Started; all ladders working 100% world pop out map SOF animations password recovery dual arena 100%
this thread will be continuously updated so keep checking back will be adding pictures soon. will be getting a team together to make this happen quicker and to get more things added will add a link soon to that soon!
Dev Team Thread Link; soon be added
Log; [font=georgia] 18/01/2015 - found a new and very stable base, will need lots of work though 19/01/2015 - moved home shops into a decent setting, fixed shop dupes, added much more commands.. found out that the character saves is very untidy!!!! will fix tomorrow... 20/01/2015 - trying to find a fix for the untidy character saves -_____- very hard will resume later!!!.... fixed skilling speeds so its not too hard but not too easy to skill! 21/01/2015 - adding random events such as a penguin will spawn and if you find and kill it you gain good items! event happens every 4 hours! 22/01/2015 - TOOK DAY OFF! 23/01/2015 - fixed clan chat, adding custom items 24/01/2015 - will be resuming on the 27th of this month 27/01/2015 - studying the code creating a GUI, adding some more features [/font]

item.title: Pirtex
item.dc:creator: @williams15 williams15
item.description:
@williams15 wrote:


Server Goals - Host the server, have a good and active community, continue to have great updates!
Things Done;
god wars
all skills working 100%
add loads of good customs
game logo
NPC facing
donator area
donator only items
100% member system
bank tabs
quests
member only quests
bank tabs
training zone
admin zone
staff zone
added random events
In Progress Of Doing;
all dupes fixed

To Be Started;
all ladders working 100%
world pop out map
SOF animations
password recovery
dual arena 100%

this thread will be continuously updated so keep checking back will be adding pictures soon.
will be getting a team together to make this happen quicker and to get more things added will add a link soon to that soon!

Dev Team Thread Link; soon be added

Log; [font=georgia]
18/01/2015 - found a new and very stable base, will need lots of work though
19/01/2015 - moved home shops into a decent setting, fixed shop dupes, added much more commands… found out that the character saves is very untidy!!! will fix tomorrow…
20/01/2015 - trying to find a fix for the untidy character saves -_____- very hard will resume later!!!.. fixed skilling speeds so its not too hard but not too easy to skill!
21/01/2015 - adding random events such as a penguin will spawn and if you find and kill it you gain good items! event happens every 4 hours!
22/01/2015 - TOOK DAY OFF!
23/01/2015 - fixed clan chat, adding custom items
24/01/2015 - will be resuming on the 27th of this month
27/01/2015 - studying the code creating a GUI, adding some more features [/font]
